sentences.sContent: ...massive terraces of corn and millet carved into the mountainside like giant steps.
sentences.sCn: …山坡上开垦出来种玉米和小米的巨型台阶般的大块大块梯田。

remMethod.val: terr(地) + ace → 一层梯田； 一排并列的房子

trans.tranCn: 斜坡地，梯田；看台，大阶级
trans.tranOther: the wide steps that the people watching a football match can stand on
